snippet: After the papal envoy was abruptly recalled from his post by the Vatican, the authorities in the Dominican Republic said they would look into rumors of child sexual abuse.
abstract: Vatican removes papal envoy Archbishop Josef Wesolowski from his post in Dominican Republic and authorities there say they will look into rumors of child sexual abuse.
lead_paragraph: After the papal envoy was abruptly recalled from his post by the Vatican, the authorities in the Dominican Republic said they would look into rumors of child sexual abuse.

headline.main: Vatican Removes Its Envoy to Dominican Republic
headline.print_headline: Vatican Removes Its Envoy To Dominican Republic
